name: twitchcommander
description: An application commanding an emulator by receiveing key from twitch

scripts.preinstall-unzip: CD SRC\Emulator\ && tar -xf bgb.zip && del /f bgb.zip &&CD ..\..
scripts.preinstall: npm run preinstall-create && npm run preinstall-cUrl && npm run preinstall-CP && npm run preinstall-unzip

author: a.lewandowski
